item.title: Your first website
item.description:
Perquisites

In principle, we need:

  • An OpenFOAM installation
  • UV to manage the Python dependencies
  • Golang and Hugo latest extended version.

You can check the exact requirements in this apptainer definition file. Alternatively you can create a container out of that definition with the help of the OpenFOAM Apptainer Packaging mechanism.

Create a new website

You can create an empty website with:

hugo new site my-docs
